text.0: drink indra marutgirt as bull the soma for joy for rapture even as thou listest.
text.1: pour down the flood of meath within thy belly thou from of old art king of soma juices.
text.2: indra accordant with the banded maruts drink soma hero as wise vṛtraslayer.
text.3: slay thou our foemen drive away assailants and make us safe on every side from danger.
text.4: and drinker at due seasons drink in season indra with friendly gods our pressedout soma.
text.5: the maruts following whom thou madest sharers gave thee the victory and thou slewest vṛtra.
text.6: drink soma indra banded with the maruts who maghavan strengthened thee at ahis slaughter.
text.7: gainst Śambara lord of bays in winning cattle and now rejoice in thee the holy singers.
text.8: the bull whose strength hath waxed whom maruts follow freegiving indra the celestial ruler.
text.9: mighty allconquering the victorygiver him let us call to grant us new protection.
